title: Digital Literacy-Integrated University Language Program Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language skills (reading, writing, speaking) and general digital tool usage experience
context.additional_context: Language-digital integrated education applying a competency-based approach in a limited smartphone-centric technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate intermediate-level academic writing and communication skills using digital platforms (blogs, SNS, etc.).
Learners can select credible language materials by applying online information evaluation and critical analysis techniques.
Learners can perform small-group projects using digital collaboration tools (cloud documents, real-time translation apps, etc.).

resources: Mobile-Friendly Language Learning Apps (Quizlet, Memrise, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
